    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javax.swing.JButton addScrambleButton
      Clicking this button opens an input dialog into which the user can enter a new scramble.
      private javax.swing.JButton applyScrambleButton
      Clicking this button applies hte selected scramble to the cube in the main window and displays the scramble at the top of the main window
      private javax.swing.JPanel buttonPanel
      The buttons of the window are stored on this panel.
      private javax.swing.JButton deleteScrambleButton
      Clicking this button deletes the selected scrambles from the list
      private javax.swing.JButton editScrambleButton
      Clicking this button opens an input dialog displaying the existing scramble, which the user can edit.
      private javax.swing.JFileChooser fileChooser
      This variable is used to select a location to save or load scrambles.
      private javax.swing.JList<java.lang.String> listHolder
      This is the list that is added to scrambleListPanel so that the contents of the list can be displayed.
      private javax.swing.JScrollPane listScrollPane
      listHolder is placed ‘inside’ this variable so that once the size of the list exceeds the size of the window, the user can scroll to view the rest of the list.
      private javax.swing.JButton loadScrambleFromFileButton
      Clicking this button opens a load dialog in which the user can select the text file which contains the scrambles they want to load
      private javax.swing.JButton saveScrambleToFileButton
      Clicking this button opens a save dialog in which the user can choose a location to save the selected scrambles
      private int scrambleIndex
      This stores the index of the next scramble to be used if the ‘Use Scrambles in List’ option is selected in the main window.
      private javax.swing.DefaultListModel<java.lang.String> scrambleList
      This stores the contents (scrambles) in the list.
      private javax.swing.JPanel scrambleListPanel
      The list of scrambles is stored in this panel.
      private static long serialVersionUID
      Default serialVersionUID

      • scrambleListPanel

        private javax.swing.JPanel scrambleListPanel
        The list of scrambles is stored in this panel.

      • scrambleList

        private javax.swing.DefaultListModel<java.lang.String> scrambleList
        This stores the contents (scrambles) in the list.

      • listHolder

        private javax.swing.JList<java.lang.String> listHolder
        This is the list that is added to scrambleListPanel so that the contents of the list can be displayed.

      • listScrollPane

        private javax.swing.JScrollPane listScrollPane
        listHolder is placed ‘inside’ this variable so that once the size of the list exceeds the size of the window, the user can scroll to view the rest of the list.

      • buttonPanel

        private javax.swing.JPanel buttonPanel
        The buttons of the window are stored on this panel.

      • addScrambleButton

        private javax.swing.JButton addScrambleButton
        Clicking this button opens an input dialog into which the user can enter a new scramble.

        private javax.swing.JButton editScrambleButton
        Clicking this button opens an input dialog displaying the existing scramble, which the user can edit.

      • deleteScrambleButton

        private javax.swing.JButton deleteScrambleButton
        Clicking this button deletes the selected scrambles from the list

      • saveScrambleToFileButton

        private javax.swing.JButton saveScrambleToFileButton
        Clicking this button opens a save dialog in which the user can choose a location to save the selected scrambles

      • loadScrambleFromFileButton

        private javax.swing.JButton loadScrambleFromFileButton
        Clicking this button opens a load dialog in which the user can select the text file which contains the scrambles they want to load

      • applyScrambleButton

        private javax.swing.JButton applyScrambleButton
        Clicking this button applies hte selected scramble to the cube in the main window and displays the scramble at the top of the main window

      • scrambleIndex

        private int scrambleIndex
        This stores the index of the next scramble to be used if the ‘Use Scrambles in List’ option is selected in the main window.

      • fileChooser

        private javax.swing.JFileChooser fileChooser
        This variable is used to select a location to save or load scrambles.

    • Method Detail

      • initListPanel

        private void initListPanel()
        Initialises the components associated with the list of scrambles in the window. Fonts, selection modes, and contents are declared here.

      • getCurrentScramble

        public java.lang.String getCurrentScramble()
                                    throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Returns:
        the next scramble in the list
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if there are no elements in the list
